messages.content: She felt something and likes me but loves other man. She lied about it for a month, treated me like junk, but then started to become warmer and then said that we should stop communicating because she is betraying another man when becoming closer to me. I said that we can just talk and it will be ok. She agreed. Then we talked some days, she became indifferent, I got angry and blocked her everywhere. Was it smart move or I just gave up?
I don't know. I don't know the facts of this specific situation.
What facts do you need about this situation?
I need the facts that you know.

She didn't see this man when we started to meet. Then she suddenly become cold as a rock. I did everything I could to make things better, we became close. And then she wrote that we should stop communicating because she's in love with another man. We talked some time, she became colder and colder and then I blocked her.
